Loading the Cannon

  1. Post WotC: Allied Crossplay
    Loading the Cannon     [Source: World|Strike FAQ]
    Play 3 Loading the Cannons in conjunction with Sergeant Kup, Veteran Sergeant and the Stratagem Death Crystal Cannon.
